layout.text: We are taking a summer break from our online shop as we settle into our new space and prepare for events and weddings to resume after the COVID shutdown.

Thank you so much for your support over the past year. Making our Saturday delivery rounds amisdt the stay-at-home order was a bright spot during a hard time for everyone and we are so grateful for your support and for the opportunity to be a part of your at-home celebrations.
We will continue our custom work for weddings and other celebrations through our main website:
